name: Hradec Králové
full_address: 4 km NE from the centre of town, east of the Labe river
airport_type: Public domestic aerodrome / Private international aerodrome
traffic: Flights of powered aircraft above local villages below 1800 ft / 550 m AMSL are prohibited. Flights through ATZ at MNM 2500 ft / 830 m AMSL.
operating_hours: MON FRI 0700 TE (0600 TE (MAX 1800)) SAT, SUN, HOL 0800 TE (0700 TE (MAX 1800)) except 24 26 DEC, 31 DEC 1 JAN, Easter Monday; otherwise O/R
fuel: AVGAS 100LL during operational hours; JET A1 during operational hours
